pages.text: $(li)Sweet Berries are a fruit that can be growed up from $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/berry_good/sweet_berry_pips)Sweet Berry Pips$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use Sweet Berries to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l), $(l)Sweet Berry Mince$(), $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/sweet_berry_sack)Sweet Berry Sack$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/berry_good/sweet_berry_pips)Sweet Berry Pips$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
